Source code for topo.config.config

#!/usr/bin/env python3



[docs]
class TopoConfig:
    """
    Holds configurable parameters for the entire topography workflow.
    Adjust defaults as needed, or pass values via constructor.
    """



[docs]
    def __init__(
        self,
        # Grid / Units
        grid_spacing=2.0,         # distance between measurements in "input_units" 
        input_units="in",         # the raw measurement units in the CSV
        output_units="ft",        # final units for display (e.g., 'in', 'ft', 'cm')
        # Interpolation / Filling
        fill_method="iterative",  # "iterative", "none" (you can extend with "scipy", etc.)
        fill_max_iterations=100,
        fill_tolerance=1e-3,
        fill_neighbor_mode="8",   # "4" or "8" neighbors
        # Transformation
        apply_transform=True,     # whether to shift so lowest measurement is 0
        invert_values=False,      # if True, treats values as depths below reference (highest value becomes 0)
        rounding=None,            # e.g. 0.5 to round to nearest 0.5 ft/in/etc. (None means no rounding)
        # Plotting
        contour_spacing=12.0,     # spacing between contour lines in output_units (e.g., 12 inches)
        contour_cmap="RdYlGn_r",  # Red-Yellow-Green (reversed: green=low, red=high)
        smooth_contours=False,    # whether to apply smoothing to contour lines
        smooth_factor=0.5,        # amount of smoothing to apply (0.0 to 1.0, higher = smoother)
        figure_size=(6, 5),
        dpi=100,
        show_plot=True,           # display the interactive window
        save_path=None,           # where to save the figure (None = no save)
        # Axis labeling
        x_label="Width",
        y_label="Height",
        title="Topographic Map"
    ):
        # Grid / Units
        self.grid_spacing = grid_spacing
        self.input_units = input_units
        self.output_units = output_units
        
        # Interpolation / Filling
        self.fill_method = fill_method
        self.fill_max_iterations = fill_max_iterations
        self.fill_tolerance = fill_tolerance
        self.fill_neighbor_mode = fill_neighbor_mode

        # Transformation
        self.apply_transform = apply_transform
        self.invert_values = invert_values
        self.rounding = rounding

        # Plotting
        self.contour_spacing = contour_spacing
        self.contour_cmap = contour_cmap
        self.smooth_contours = smooth_contours
        self.smooth_factor = max(0.0, min(1.0, smooth_factor))  # Clamp between 0 and 1
        self.figure_size = figure_size
        self.dpi = dpi
        self.show_plot = show_plot
        self.save_path = save_path
        self.x_label = x_label
        self.y_label = y_label
        self.title = title
